slidelink.displaytext: Taking responsibility for the stages involved in making a product
Cleans and maintains the machines used in the production process
Conducts studies on services or productions
Keeping a record of the costs and revenues of a business
This area is responsible for distributing products
Schedules the vacation time for employees
Checking that services supplied are to the standards expected
Jerry is conducting research to establish pricing, product design and advertising for his business. Which of the functional areas is Jerry operating?
John was hired at Train Enterprises in the finance department. Which of the following activities are part of his functional area of finance? Preparing accounts Conducting a survey Making payments

search.slidetext: functional areas of business click here to begin click here to begin click here to begin click here to begin click here to begin click here to begin

the functional areas of business describes the work that needs to be carried out by a particular section of a business lets look at some practice activities that matches the functional areas to their roles click to try the activities click to try the activities click to try the activities click to try the activities click to try the activities click to try the activities
provides healthy and clean environment human resource production finance research and development

john was hired at train enterprises in the finance department. which of the following activities are part of his functional area of finance? preparing accounts conducting a survey making payments i only i only i only i only i only i only i and ii only i and ii only i and ii only i and ii only i and ii only i and ii only ii only ii only ii only ii only ii only ii only i and iii only i and iii only i and iii only i and iii only i and iii only i and iii only
good effort in this area. remember functional area are the departments in a business that performs specific functions for the successful operation of a business entity.
